data.title: A Kolber injured by the direct fire from the Iranian government forces at the border of Nowsud
data.meta_description: A young Kolber from Javanroud, named Saman Alizadeh, was severely injured by direct fire from the Ir
data.text:
Hengaw: Friday, July 21, 2023

A young Kolber from Javanroud, named Saman Alizadeh, was severely injured by direct fire from the Iranian armed forces while working in the border heights of the Nowsud district of Paveh, Kermanshah province.

According to the report received by the Hengaw Organization for Human Rights, on the evening of Wednesday, July 19, 2023, Iranian border guards stationed at the border of Nowsud opened fire on a group of Kolbers, and as a result, a Kolber named Saman Alizadeh was severely injured.

According to an informed source, Saman Alizadeh was shot in the shoulder and elbow by these forces.

This young Kolbar, who is from the "Kalash Bakhan" village of Javanroud, has been transferred to medical centers for treatment.
